game_info.name: Binding of Isaac Clone
game_info.description: Top-down roguelike with twin-stick shooting. Clear rooms of enemies, collect items that synergize, defeat bosses, and descend floors. Permadeath with unlockable content.

core_loop.description: Enter room -> Kill all enemies -> Doors unlock -> Find items/shops/boss -> Beat boss -> Descend floor -> Repeat until death or victory

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Arrow keys fire tears in that direction. WASD moves. Clear all enemies to unlock doors.
